title: Cataracte de Niagara
description: A copper engraving of Niagara Falls Cataracte de Niagara uncoloured and published in 1754
creator: Jacques Nicholas Bellin

title: Canada
description: The map was prepared and published in Bonne's two volume Atlas Encyclopedique in Paris in 1788
creator: Rigobert Bonne

title: Carte de la Partie Septentrionale de la Mer du Sud
description: A map by Jacques Nicolas Bellin with engraver Louis-Andre Dupuis drafted in light of the voyages and discoveries of Captain James Cook in 1778 and 1779 with the map's notations based on the drafts of lieu. Henry Roberts
creator: Jacques Nicholas Bellin

title: Planisphere suivant la Projection de Mercator 1780
description: Mercator projection of the world in 1780 not taking into account recent explorations of the Pacific
creator: Rigobert Bonne

title: Amerique Septentrionale 1780
description: A map from Guillaume Raynal's Atlas de Toutes les Parties Connues du Globe Terrestre Dresse pour l'Histoire Philosophique et Politque des Etablissemens et du Commerce des Europeens dans les Deux Indes depicting North America without many political divisions
creator: Rigobert Bonne

title: Map of North America 1764
description: A map of North America from Salmon's Geography 1764
creator: Thomas Jeffrey
